column4: anyone know how do you disable the VERY annoying window auto resizing when you move it to the edge of the screen?
#compiz
seriously if I wasn't so drunk I'd tell you but it's in ccsm
is that something I need to install? I can't find anything that seems to relate in any menu or command line tool
it should be installed default, ccsm on a terminal if you are comfortable
sudo: ccsm: command not found
ok then, sudo apt-get install ccsm
it's just a way to control compiz which is the default window manager
E: Unable to locate package ccsm same for compiz-config-settings-manager
I believe it's actually called compizconfig-settings-manager
only compiz            compiz-decorator
what repositories do you have?e
the standard ones plus one for my printer
bazhang apt-get ... compizconfig-settings-manager works
bazhang ok, got it, thanks for your help
well this compizconfig-settings-manager is the package
sorry I meant to paste my apt-cache show?
one moment
http://paste.ubuntu.com/610933/
thanks. I have it. apt-get install compizconfig-settings-manager did it
great@
ya that package contains ccsm
or is, in a sense ccsm
sweet, thanks
